cz.ive.location
Class Area2DGrid

java.lang.Object
  cz.ive.messaging.SyncHook
      cz.ive.iveobject.IveIdImpl
          cz.ive.iveobject.IveObjectImpl
              cz.ive.location.WayPointImpl
                  cz.ive.location.CommonArea
                      cz.ive.location.Area2DGrid
All Implemented Interfaces:
IveId, IveObject, Area, GridArea, WayPoint, Hook, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
public class Area2DGrid
extends CommonArea
implements GridArea

Implements an area as a 2d grid - location containing a net of WayPoints in a two-dimensional full grid.

Author:
pavel
See Also:
Serialized Form

generatePath

private void generatePath(WayPoint wp,
                          Joint j)
Takes a joint to a phantom and generates the path of two unsubstantial WayPoints. The join to phantom will be changed to following structure: join to a new valid WayPoint representing the path, from this WayPoint join to the phantom of similar generated WayPoint on the other side. This avoids crowds.

Parameters:
wp - WayPoint from which the joint starts
j - The joint itself

getAt

public WayPoint getAt(int x,
                      int y)
Description copied from interface: GridArea
Gets the WayPoint, which is situated in the geven coordinates relatively to that area. These coordinates have nothing together with realPosition, they determine the position in the area's grid.

Specified by:
getAt in interface GridArea
Parameters:
x - First grid coordinate
y - Second grid coordinate
Returns:
WayPoint on grid coordinates x, y, or null if some index is out of bounds
